FuncDef:
The forward alarm cpu-usage multi-core threshold command sets the alarm threshold for the multi-core CPU average usage on a board regardless of service types.
The undo forward alarm cpu-usage multi-core threshold command restores the default alarm threshold for the multi-core CPU average usage on a board regardless of service types.
By default, the alarm threshold for the multi-core CPU average usage on a board is 95%.
CLIs: undo forward alarm cpu-usage multi-core threshold [ <threshold-value> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the alarm threshold for the multi-core CPU average usage on a board.
The value is an integer that ranges from 40 to 100. The default value is 95.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To set the alarm threshold for the multi-core CPU average usage on a board regardless of service types, run the forward alarm cpu-usage multi-core threshold command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
